name: Norby Aviation, LLC
about: Norby Aviation LLC is a premier flight training institution based at Southbridge Municipal Airport (3B0) in Massachusetts. We specialize in personalized, professionally delivered flight instruction, tailored to help students achieve their aviation goals safely and enjoyably. Our team, led by Senior Flight Instructor Tyler, an FAA Gold Seal instructor with over 3000 hours of instruction, is dedicated to providing high-quality training. Although we are currently not accepting new students, we celebrate the achievements of our existing students, including first solos and private pilot certifications. For more information, contact us at 774-224-2335 or email kevin@norbyaviation.com. We are committed to excellence in flight training.
services:
